channel.title: RuneSound, You'll have to see it to believe it
channel.description:
[center][img]http://runesound.com/images/logo1.png[/img] Hello ladies and gentlemen, I'm here to introduce my new project in hopes to spark some crowd interest. For this project I will be bringing back the old 317's in a way that has never been seen or done before.
[b]RuneSound[/b] is a combination of three of our favorite games; Minecraft, Runescape, and Hunger Games. By the end of development we hope to have
▪ 2,000+ obtainable items ▪ 500+ unique pvm monsters ▪ 15+ unique boss creatures ▪ 10+ unique minigames ▪ 5+ different classes for Hunger Games ▪ 50+ explorable areas ▪ 200+ Reasonably ridiculous custom items ▪ 20+ skills fully functional ▪ 30+ strange monsters released at night ▪ Highscore integration ▪ Vote4Cash integration ▪ Webclient integration ▪ IPBoards integration
Although this server is only a work in progress, I am currently looking for developers If you're interested in becoming a developer for this project, please add Connor.S68 on Skype and we can talk about your future with RuneSound. To track our progress you can visit our website at *

item.title: RuneSound, You'll have to see it to believe it
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

That’s an odd combination. Interesting to see how it will turn out.

Read full topic

item.description:

Good luck.

@paradoxreborn wrote:

[center]
Hello ladies and gentlemen, I’m here to introduce my new project in hopes to spark some crowd interest.
For this project I will be bringing back the old 317’s in a way that has never been seen or done before.

RuneSound is a combination of three of our favorite games; Minecraft, Runescape, and Hunger Games. By the end of development we hope to have

2,000+ obtainable items
500+ unique pvm monsters
15+ unique boss creatures
10+ unique minigames

50+ explorable areas
200+ Reasonably ridiculous custom items
20+ skills fully functional
30+ strange monsters released at night
Highscore integration
Vote4Cash integration
Webclient integration
IPBoards integration

Although this server is only a work in progress, I am currently looking for developers
If you’re interested in becoming a developer for this project, please add Connor.S68 on Skype and we can talk about your future with RuneSound.
To track our progress you can visit our website at *
